page.title: 16HOBBIES,ORGANISATIONS DUNLOP
page.content: IN DUNLOP THERE ARE A FEW ORGANISATIONS FOR CHILDREN AND ADULTS. ON MONDAY AND TUESDAY NIGHTS THERE IS YOUTH CLUB AND ON WEDNESDAY NIGHT THERE IS BADMINTON.THURSDAY NIGHT THERE IS YOGA AND ON FRIDAY NIGHT TO KEEP THE{KIDS}FIT THERE IS GYMNASTICS. ALL OF THESE ARE HELD IN THE SCHOOL. THE YOUNG WOMEN CAN JOIN THE GUILD,RURAL OR YOUNG WOMANS GROUP.IF YOU WANT TO JOIN THE RURAL YOU HAVE TO BE 26 YEARS OF AGE.IT IS USUALLY HELD IN THE PUBLIC HALL. IF IT ISN'T IT WILL BE HELD IN THE SUNDAY SCHOOL HALL.THE{KIDS}CAN JOIN THE CUBS OR BROWNIES OR IF THEY ARE OLDER THE GUIDES OR SCOUTS,THEY ARE HELD AT HAPLAND MILL. IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN SPORT YOU CAN JOIN THE CRICKET OR BOWLING CLUB.AND LADIES WITH TODDLERS CAN JOIN THE MOTHERS AND TODDLERS GROUP. {"KID"}ANOTHER NAME FOR CHILD.
